content: I know a woman who had said she thought she wanted children, but hasn’t found the right partner to have one with. Now she wonders if it’s about the partner, or maybe she never wanted them in the first place. And regardless, it’s her choice, which is the beautiful part! I never understood how some people could be so against cats!! They’re beautiful and sweet little beings with big personality. I call my cat my little best friend, haha!
